project.twitter.twitter_analyzer

class project.twitter.twitter_analyzer.TweetAnalyzer(twitter_client, openai_client)[source]

Bases: object

TweetAnalyzer is responsible for fetching, processing, and analyzing tweets.

twitter_client

An instance of a Twitter client for fetching tweets.

Type:

TwitterClient

openai_client

An instance of an OpenAI client for analyzing tweets.

Type:

OpenAIClient

async fetch_and_analyze_tweets(user_id)[source]

Fetches tweets for a given user and performs sentiment analysis on them.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – The ID of the user whose tweets are to be fetched and analyzed.

Returns:

None

static process_tweets(tweets)[source]

Processes a list of tweets and extracts relevant data.

Parameters:

tweets (list) – A list of tweet objects.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries containing processed tweet data.

Return type:

list

static generate_review(tweet_data_list)[source]

Generates a review text from a list of processed tweet data.

Parameters:

tweet_data_list (list) – A list of dictionaries containing processed tweet data.

Returns:

A review text based on the tweet data.

Return type:

str

static save_analysis(analysis, file_path)[source]

Saves the analysis result to a file.

Parameters:

  • analysis (str) – The analysis result to be saved.

  • file_path (str) – The path of the file where the analysis will be saved.

Returns:

None
